summary: Frontend testing completed for XoW Speaker Diarization Dashboard. All 10 critical features tested and verified working correctly. Speaker diarization with GPT-4o is functional with test recording showing 2 speakers (Sarah as HOST from TechCorp, John Smith as guest from ABC Industries).

issues: Speaker boxes could benefit from more data-testid attributes for better testability

critical_code_review_comments: Dashboard HTML is well-structured with proper responsive design
Speaker diarization data is properly displayed with labels, companies, topics, key points, and questions
Play buttons show correct timestamps for jumping to specific moments
Consider adding more data-testid attributes to interactive elements for better automated testing
seed_data_creation: Test recording 'Speaker Diarization Test' already existed with 2 speakers and processed transcript
context_for_next_testing_agent: Dashboard is served at /api/dashboard. The Speaker Diarization Test recording has full speaker diarization data including: Sarah (HOST) from TechCorp and John Smith from ABC Industries. All UI components including speaker boxes, play buttons, dialogue toggles, follow-up actions, overall summary, and host identification are working correctly.

features_tested.dashboard_loads: PASS - Dashboard loads with sessions list
features_tested.speaker_diarization_data: PASS - Speaker data displays correctly in UI
features_tested.detailed_insights_button: PASS - Button appears for recordings with speaker data
features_tested.speaker_boxes_expand: PASS - Clicking Detailed Insights reveals speaker boxes
features_tested.speaker_box_content: PASS - Shows label, company, topics, key points, questions
features_tested.play_buttons_timestamps: PASS - Play buttons show correct timestamps (0:00-0:15, 0:15-0:30)
features_tested.dialogue_toggle: PASS - Show full dialogue toggle works correctly
features_tested.overall_summary: PASS - Overall Summary displays correctly with host identified badge
features_tested.visitors_view: PASS - Visitors view shows barcode scans with watch timestamps
